name: 7 Phase Invaders
description:
A simple Shoot 'em up game where you have to survive 7 phase to win. Controls:
  • WASD / Arrow Key (movement)
  • Left Mouse Click (select)
This prototype was made to test:

  1. Roguelike mechanics
  2. Game design potential in PvE and PvP

By all means there are a lot to improve on so any feedback or comments are welcome! It will help me learn and make better games in the future!
